CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 24, 1961, pg. A10 reads:"The Squaws Plan Holiday Fete - The planning committee of The Squaws Club has completed plans for an evening of fun and dancing, to highlight the Fourth of July Holiday, by sponsoring a "Cotton Extravaganza" at the beautiful Hilton Hotel, on July 3. Tickets are $3 per person.  Music will be provided by the Bobby Jones Trio and song-stylist Delores ware.  Left to right, seated: Ruth Moorer, Mary Shelton, chairman, and Josephine Bagley, financial secretary.  Standing: Johnnie Matthews, treasurer; Betty Watkins and Ethyl Chavis, president of the popular Squaws. - Harris Photo-ADV."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of six Squaw members, from left, seated: Ruth Moorer, Mary Shelton, and Josephine Bagley; standing: Johnnie Matthews, Betty Watkins, and Ethyl Chavis, gathered around table with documents for meeting, in interior with floor lamp and patterned curtain
